name: Critical Battle Strike: Shoot
description:
Critical Battle Strike: Shoot Gun is a classic 3D shooting game.It delivers the nostalgic fps gaming experience. The game has a hot and realistic battle scenes, smooth operation, rich weapon system and the intelligent enemies regulation system.
Feautres:
- Smooth and responsive customizable touch controls
- Dozens of unique weapons (and more added continuously)
- Realistic combat experience, rich combat action and combat sound
- Intelligent AI and exciting gameplay
- Amazing maps
